channel.title: Talking in jail?
channel.description: I am not able to talk in my jail. I have looked through the player classes, but I can't seem to find anything because it doesn't send a message saying, "you can't talk in jail." How would I make me able to talk in jail, or how would I make people not able to follow in certain areas if I decided to move the jail to a different location.

item.title: Talking in jail?
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

I am beast:

I am not able to talk in my jail. I have looked through the player classes, but I can’t seem to find anything because it doesn’t send a message saying, “you can’t talk in jail.” How would I make me able to talk in jail, or how would I make people not able to follow in certain areas if I decided to move the jail to a different location.

Well in the chatting packet, and look for something like if(!isJailed)
obviously not exactly that, but you should get what I’m saying
Anyways,
remove that, and if it has a ‘{’ after it, remove the next ‘}’ in the code
And for the followplayer, just add an if-else statement and boom
EDIT: Wrong section

Read full topic
